description:
Hurt And Need Help?

Have you suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of another party's negligent, careless or unlawful actions? If so, you have rights, and you can trust the attorneys at the Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC law firm to help you secure the compensation and benefits you deserve while holding the responsible parties accountable for their actions.

Serving Canton And All Of Ohio

Our law office in Canton, Ohio, is one of the 10 we have in the state, and from this location, we serve clients throughout Stark County and the surrounding region adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, dangerous medical devices and drugs, defective products, dangerous property conditions, and work-related illnesses and injuries.

The Experience You Need

With more than 400 years of combined legal experience among them, the attorneys at our law firm possess the skills and resources necessary to handle even the most complex and challenging cases. Throughout our history, we have assisted over 10,000 clients throughout Ohio, securing more than $450 million in settlements and awards on behalf of those we serve.

Efficient, Effective And Personalized Service

From this level of success and the impeccable representation we provide to those in need, our law firm has earned a reputation as one of the top personal injury practices in the state, and we receive many referrals from clients satisfied with the efficient, effective and personalized service they received from our attorneys.

To discuss your situation with one of our dedicated legal professionals, you can contact Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC to schedule a free initial consultation.
